name: Sweet Candy Crack No Ad
description:
Quick sweet candy crack match 3 game for all candy puzzle games. Connect & drag 3 or more candies to burst them all. Create longest candy line to make combo in your free time anywhere.

Enjoy our quick sweet candy crack puzzle game. Bring it out anytime, quick start, great to kill time!

Sweet Candy Crack Feature:

- Quick but addictive match-3 puzzle game
- Connect 3 or more candies to blast them.
- Match 4 or more candies to make super combo and gain time
- Beautiful and tempting candy design with magic glamour
- Play anywhere anytime: Can also be played offline.
- No-Ad, No Pop up

Bring out your phone to start cracking candy now!
